name: DigiGoat Does
description: The official demo of the DigiGoat Software

name: Description
description: You can see this description right here, but if it is longer than 3 lines, it is automatically hidden. But once you click on the doe, you can see the rest!

name: Images
description: You can pick which image you want to display here, then you can open up the modal to see the rest of them. Additionally, if you are using Safari, when you click share, it will preview the doe's name as well as all their images

name: Date of Birth
description: You can see the age of the doe here. If you click on it, you can see his exact date of birth
You can also specify your doe's nickname, which will also be used for the link
You can also specify your doe's ID, which can be used for the link if needed

name: Tattoo
description: The tattoo's are on hear as well, which can be helpful at fairs if you can't remember them

name: Color and Marking
description: The doe's markings are also on here, which can be useful if someone is trying to identify which doe is which
colorAndMarking: The perfect combination of doe's and technology
